execute ( $  Options,
$  Provider,
$  FilePath 
)

Function starts controller/view.

Parameters:
$Options - Execution parameters.
$Provider - Object of the class wich provides all handlers.
$FilePath - Path tp the component. Must be equal to __FILE__
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 671 of file context_set.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $this->Trace->start_group( "ContextSet::execute for class \"".get_class( $Provider )."\"" );
                        $this->Trace->add_trace_string( serialize( $Options->get_raw_settings() ) , COMMON );
                        
                        $Options->set_setting( 'file_path' , $FilePath );
                        $this->Provider = $Provider;
                        $this->Provider->Output = false;

                        $CommonSettingsConfigFileName = $Options->get_setting( 'common_settings_config' , 'cfcxs_context_set' );
                        $CommonSettingsConfigFilePath = dirname( $FilePath )."/conf/$CommonSettingsConfigFileName";
                        if( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_exists( $CommonSettingsConfigFilePath ) )
                        {
                              $this->ContextSetSettings->load_file( $CommonSettingsConfigFilePath );
                              
                              $this->Version = intval( $this->ContextSetSettings->get_setting( 'version' , 0 ) );
                              $this->Prefix = $this->ContextSetSettings->get_setting( 'prefix' );
                              $this->Prefix = str_replace( 
                                    '{functionality}' , $this->ContextSetSettings->get_setting( 'functionality' , '' ) , 
                                    $this->Prefix
                              );
                              $this->Prefix = str_replace( 
                                    '{entity}' , $this->ContextSetSettings->get_setting( 'entity' , '' ) , $this->Prefix
                              );
                        }

                        if( $this->CommonStateStartup->run_commmon_states( $this , $Options ) !== false )
                        {
                              $this->clear();
                              $this->Trace->end_group();
                              return;
                        }

                        $this->process_custom_configs( $Options );
                        
                        $this->Trace->end_group();
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

get_update_record ( $  New,
$  Original 
)

Definition at line 244 of file context_set.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Update = array();
                        
                        foreach( $New as $Field => $NewValue )
                        {
                              $Field = str_replace( $this->Prefix.'_' , '' , $Field );
                              
                              if( @$Original->$Field == $NewValue )
                              {
                                    continue;
                              }
                              if( @$Original->$Field != $this->Security->get( $NewValue , 'unsafe_string' ) )
                              {
                                    @$Update[ $Field ] = $NewValue;
                                    continue;
                              }
                        }
                        
                        return( $Update );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

                        list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_prefix( $Str , $Changed );
                        $this->Provider->Output = $this->PageComposer->execute_processors( $Str , 'process_string' );

pre_edit_validation ( $  Options  ) 

Function validates data to edit.

Parameters:
$Options - Execution parameters.
Returns:
true if the validation was passed.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 295 of file context_set.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Ids = $this->Security->get_gp( $this->Prefix.'_id' , 'raw' );

                        $RecordOriginal = $this->ContextSetUtilities->get_data_record( $Options , $Ids );
                        
                        $ValidationScript = $Options->get_setting( 'custom_get_post_validation' );
                        $RecordNew = $this->Security->parse_http_parameters( $ValidationScript );
                        
                        $UpdateRecord = $this->get_update_record( $RecordNew , $RecordOriginal );
                        
                        $ValidationScript = explode( '#' , $ValidationScript );
                        
                        foreach( $ValidationScript as $s )
                        {
                              $s = str_replace( $this->Prefix.'_' , '' , $s );
                              $Field = explode( ':' , $s );
                              $Field = str_replace( $this->Prefix.'_' , '' , $Field[ 0 ] );
                              
                              if( isset( $UpdateRecord[ $Field ] ) )
                              {
                                    $Result = $this->Security->validate_custom_fields( $UpdateRecord , $s );
                                    if( $Result === false )
                                    {
                                          $this->PageComposer->add_error_message( $this->Security->ErrorMessage );
                                          return( $Result );
                                    }
                              }
                        }
                        
                        return( true );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

process_custom_configs ( $  Options  ) 

Function starts controller/view.

Parameters:
$Options - Execution parameters.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 545 of file context_set.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $this->Trace->start_group( "custom configs processing" , COMMON );
                        
                        foreach( $this->Contexts as $i => $ContextPath )
                        {
                              $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "Processing context $ContextPath" , COMMON );
                              
                              $Config = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $ContextPath );
                              $Config = str_replace( '{prefix}' , $this->Prefix , $Config );
                              
                              $CustomSettings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                              $CustomSettings->load_settings( $Config );
                              $CustomSettings->add_settings_from_object( $Options );

                              if( $CustomSettings->get_setting( 'success_func' , false ) == 'multy_call' )
                              {
                                    $this->Context->load_raw_config( $Config );
                                    
                                    $this->DefaultControllers->set_constants( $this , $Options );
                                    if( $this->run_execution( $CustomSettings , $this->DefaultControllers , 1 ) )
                                    {
                                          $this->clear();
                                          $this->Trace->end_group();
                                          return;
                                    }
                              }
                              elseif( $CustomSettings->get_setting( 'success_func' , false ) == 'simple_form' )
                              {
                                    $this->Context->load_raw_config( $Config );
                                    
                                    if( $this->run_execution( $CustomSettings , $this , 0 ) )
                                    {
                                          $this->clear();
                                          $this->Trace->end_group();
                                          return;
                                    }
                              }
                              elseif( $CustomSettings->get_setting( 'success_func' , false ) == 'list_view' )
                              {
                                    global                  $SkipCallParamsValidation;
                                    if( $SkipCallParamsValidation )
                                    {
                                          $CustomSettings->remove_setting( 'call_params_filter' );
                                    }
                                    
                                    $this->Context->load_config_from_object( $CustomSettings );
                                    
                                    if( $this->Context->execute( $CustomSettings , $this ) )
                                    {
                                          $this->clear();
                                          $this->Trace->end_group();
                                          return;
                                    }
                              }
                              elseif( $CustomSettings->get_setting( 'success_func' , false ) == 'record_view_form' )
                              {
                                    $this->Context->load_raw_config( $Config );
                                    
                                    if( $this->Context->execute( $CustomSettings , $this ) )
                                    {
                                          $this->clear();
                                          $this->Trace->end_group();
                                          return;
                                    }
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $OldProvider = $this->Provider;
                                    
                                    if( $CustomSettings->get_setting( 'provider_package_name' , false ) !== false )
                                    {
                                          $this->Provider = get_package(
                                                                        $CustomSettings->get_setting( 'provider_package_name' ) , 
                                                                        $CustomSettings->get_setting( 'provider_package_version' , 'last' ) , 
                                                                        __FILE__ );
                                    }

                                    $this->Context->load_raw_config( $Config );
                                    
                                    if( $this->run_execution( $CustomSettings , $this->Provider ) )
                                    {
                                          $OldProvider->Output = $this->Provider->Output;
                                          $this->clear();
                                          $this->Trace->end_group();
                                          return;
                                    }
                              }
                        }
                        
                        $this->Trace->end_group();
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

                  {
                        $TemplateName = $Options->get_setting( 'form_template' , $this->Prefix.'_view_form.tpl' );
                        $ComponentPath = dirname( $Options->get_setting( 'file_path' ) );
                        $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( "$ComponentPath/res/templates/$TemplateName" );

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( $this->Context->execute( $Options , $Provider ) )
                        {
                              $this->ContextSetUtilities->process_redirect( $Options , $AutoRedirect );

                              $this->GUI->set_var( 'last_context_set_execution_code' , 0 );
                              $this->GUI->set_var( 
                                    'last_context_set_execution_message' , $this->PageComposer->get_last_success_message()
                              );
                                    
                              return( true );
                        }
